articles.content: In Uncle Frank, the writer-director Alan Ball (True Blood) combines several overworked genres the coming-of-age picture, the road-trip odyssey, the angst-filled family-reunion movie and mostly steers… [+596 chars]

articles.title: K-pop band BTS earn their first Grammy nomination for hit song 'Dynamite' - CNN
articles.description: K-pop group BTS, arguably the biggest boy band in the world, earned their first ever Grammy Award nomination on Tuesday for their hit song 'Dynamite.'
articles.content:
